question: Who has won maximum number of medals in the World Wrestling Championships till date?
explanation: Valentin Yordanov has won the maximum number of medals in the World Wrestling Championships. He has a total of 10 medals including 7 gold, 2 silver and 1 bronze. He is a Bulgarian wrestler who competed in the 42kg weight class.
